reviewText: Another excellent DVD by Julie Goodnight. She is consistently professional and delivers useful information. She is a confident equine professional who never cuts down the competition or beginning riders. I would recommend purchasing the entire set of DVD's.

I have watched and re-watched several times and never get bored and something new clicks every time. I am soooo glad I ordered this dvd in particular. Julie is so gifted at teaching in a methodical down to earth fashion. I don't think anyone can go wrong with this dvd it has so much insight and it is critical information. Like Julie says "we didn't teach the horse this stuff, the horse taught US!" She doesn't miss a thing, everything is so well thought out and articulated BUY IT!! and let your Horse be the JUDGE. Enjoy!
